message.content:
Below is a concise breakdown of how the pictured scene is built and which Dictionary blocks are used.  The final assembly requires two separate structures (the “ring” shape on the left and the “house” shape on the right), for a total of 11 blocks.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1)  MAIN‐IMAGE ANALYSIS
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
●  Left “Ring” Structure  
   –  Composed of three pieces in a single tall “layer.”  
   –  A large red block with a circular opening runs vertically.  
   –  Through that circular opening, a green rectangular bar spans front‐to‐back.  
   –  A small blue cube sits at the center of the green bar.  

●  Right “House” Structure  
   –  Built in four vertical layers (bottom to top).  
     1)  Bottom layer: two blue cubes (left & right) with a yellow rectangular block bridging them.  
     2)  Second layer: one blue cube on the left and one red cube on the right.  
     3)  Third layer: a green rectangular block bridging across the top of those two cubes.  
     4)  Top (roof): two orange triangular wedges forming a peaked roof.  

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2)  SELECTED BLOCKS & INDICES
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
●  Left “Ring” Structure uses:  
   –  Block #3  (red “tall ring” block with circular hole)  
   –  Block #10 (green rectangular bar)  
   –  Block #4  (blue cube)  

●  Right “House” Structure uses:  
   –  Three Block #4’s  (blue cubes)  
   –  One  Block #7     (red cube)  
   –  One  Block #11    (yellow short rectangular block)  
   –  One  Block #10    (green rectangular bar)  
   –  One  Block #14    (orange triangular wedge)  
   –  One  Block #15    (orange triangular wedge)  

In total, 11 blocks are required:  
  #3 × 1, #4 × 4, #7 × 1, #10 × 2, #11 × 1, #14 × 1, #15 × 1.  

All must be used exactly as shown (no re‐orienting) to match shape and color.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3)  STEP-BY-STEP ASSEMBLY ORDER
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
{
  Step1:  Move block with index 3   (place tall red ring for the left structure)
  Step2:  Move block with index 10  (slide green bar through the ring’s opening)
  Step3:  Move block with index 4   (insert small blue cube in center of green bar)

  Step4:  Move block with index 4   (place bottom-left blue cube of house)
  Step5:  Move block with index 4   (place bottom-right blue cube of house)
  Step6:  Move block with index 11  (bridge the two bottom cubes with yellow block)

  Step7:  Move block with index 4   (set second-layer blue cube on left)
  Step8:  Move block with index 7   (set second-layer red cube on right)

  Step9:  Move block with index 10  (green bar bridging the second-layer cubes)
  Step10: Move block with index 14  (left orange roof wedge)
  Step11: Move block with index 15  (right orange roof wedge)
}

Following the above sequence will exactly reproduce the target image.
